params._recommended: Recommended protocol version to operate on thi chain.
params._required: Required protocol version to operate on this chain.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

returns.out_: Recommended protocol version to sync to the head of the chain.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

returns.out_: Required protocol version to sync to the head of the chain.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

RECOMMENDED_SLOT().notice: Storage slot that the recommended protocol version is stored at.

REQUIRED_SLOT().notice: Storage slot that the required protocol version is stored at.

constructor.notice: Constructs the ProtocolVersion contract. Cannot set         the owner to `address(0)` due to the Ownable contract's         implementation, so set it to `address(0xdEaD)`         A zero version is considered empty and is ignored by nodes.

recommended().notice: High level getter for the recommended protocol version.

required().notice: High level getter for the required protocol version.

setRecommended(uint256).notice: Updates the recommended protocol version. Can only be called by the owner.

setRequired(uint256).notice: Updates the required protocol version. Can only be called by the owner.

RECOMMENDED_SLOT().notice: Storage slot that the recommended protocol version is stored at.

REQUIRED_SLOT().notice: Storage slot that the required protocol version is stored at.

required().notice: High level getter for the required protocol version.
